title: vigiLAnTE

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Shoot a player at night. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a town member, You will the  end of the 2nd night after  (eg: n1 shot, n2 miskill; dies n3)
- You are chronically late and as such shoot on the following night instead
- dies at  very end of night  so if you shot n2 it'll go through and then you die (but not the n3 shot)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.

desc:
Post 5027
*no more instant death for mistakes*
